image.altText: A man with short white hair in a burgundy sweater with his arms crossed looks concerned.

image.altText: A woman with dark blonde hair pulled back smiles lightly.

props.synopsis: The ACT health minister apologises for mistakes that led to the death of Jessica Bovill, who was given a dose of sodium bicarbonate "far in excess" of what was recommended, resulting in her death at the Canberra Hospital.

title.children: Jessica died due to a hospital error. Her family was told it was suicide

image.altText: Gosford Council offers to complete Highway upgrade.

props.synopsis: A man who drove his ute onto a flooded causeway with two men standing on the tray will serve an intensive corrections order instead of a prison term.

image.altText: A 56-year-old man smiling and wearing glasses.

props.synopsis: The family of Canberra man Harri Jokinen, who was killed during a high-speed police pursuit on the Monaro Highway in 2021, hopes an inquest into his death will lead to a change in policy.

title.children: Family hopes coronial inquest leads to change in police pursuit policy

image.altText: A pharmacist in a chemist.

image.altText: A concrete building reading "Law Courts of the Australian Capital Territory", with the Australian, ACT and Aboriginal flags.

image.altText: A man in hand-cuffs is escorted by two police officers along a road.

props.synopsis: An inquiry into a series of landslides on the Mornington Peninsula, just outside Melbourne has heard multiple theories as to what caused them. Several theories involve water damage throughout the hillside neighbourhood.

title.children: The collapse of a multi-million-dollar home shocked many. But clues may have bubbled up for weeks

image.altText: Ben Roberts-Smith in a suit and tie

props.synopsis: Lawyers for former SAS corporal will likely spend the coming days pouring over the reasons for the dismissal of his appeal.

title.children: 'We're talking millions of dollars': Roberts-Smith facing huge costs bill

image.altText: Murray Watt environment minister

image.altText: A close up photo of Erin Patterson looking over her shoulder wearing glases.
